35232142: Flooding in Newton Stewart and the Borders caused significant damage, prompting calls for better flood defenses and faster response efforts, with ongoing repairs and disrupted travel.
40143035: Two tour buses carrying German and Chinese-Taiwanese groups were deliberately set on fire at a Northern Ireland hotel, destroying passengers' belongings and delaying their travel plans.
35951548: Mercedes secured pole position in Bahrain GP qualifying despite Ferrari's strong challenge, with Hamilton narrowly beating Rosberg, while rookie Vandoorne outperformed Button.
36266422: A 67-year-old former scout leader denies 22 charges of child sexual abuse from the 1970s and 80s, accused by four male complainants.
38826984: A man receiving psychiatric treatment at Cerahpasa hospital threatened to shoot himself and others, prompting an evacuation, but no hostages were taken.
